Computational Methods

Computational methods, astrostatistics, machine learning, visualization, and general coding.

Textbooks

  • Python for Astronomers by Imad Pasha and Chris Agostino
  • Python Data Science Handbook by Jake VanderPlas
  • Scientific Visualization: Python + Matplotlib by Nicolas P. Rougier

Tutorials + Notebooks

  • Resources from the LSSTC Data Science Fellowship Program sessions
